title: Elementary Social Studies Education Competency Enhancement Course Through Real-Time Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies for integrated online-offline classroom management by establishing a mobile-based real-time blended learning environment for in-service elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design classes that promote interaction between online and offline learners by over 80% using real-time video tools and mobile LMS
Learners can diagnose and propose improvements for social equity issues in blended learning processes at least three times using action-based research methodologies
Learners can develop and apply two or more formative assessment tools combining 15-minute microlearning modules with real-time feedback in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
